answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.The most probable cause for the burning sensation could be neuropathy, a disorder of the nerves. Its unlikely that people looking at you could have caused this effect. Most common cause for neuropathy is diabetes.  It can also be due to metabolic disorders, vitamin deficiencies, infections and traumatic injuries. The sensation may need proper evaluation by your GP, please consult him for a neurological assessment.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.
